author: Staff Reporter
text:
Puthiya Tamilagam founder-president K. Krishnasamy on Saturday urged the government to provide adequate compensation for the Dalit families affected by the recent communal clash in Kuruvithurai here.

Mr. Krishnasamy visited the village and enquired with the Dalit families about the attack by the caste Hindu community during Pongal festival. Alleging that many of the real culprits who carried out the attack were still at large, Mr. Krishnasamy urged the police to arrest all of them. He also demanded that the damaged houses of the Dalit families be completely repaired by the district administration without any delay.
title: Krishnasamy visits Kuruvithurai
